Description:
Detects scenario where if a user is assigned the SeEnableDelegationPrivilege right in Active Directory it would allow control of other AD user objects.

Author: @neu5ron
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Enabled User Right in AD to Control User Objects
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where (eventid = '4704' and privilegelist like '%seenabledelegationprivilege%')
